column4: Hi, during the install I type the chars appears at screen and ubuntu collect these information to detect my keyboard. I would like to reconfigure it please. What is the comm
Hi, during the install I type the chars appears at screen and ubuntu collect these information to detect my keyboard. I would like to reconfigure it please. What is the comm
System - Preferences - Keyboard - Layouts, go there
There is no need to repeat twice :D
